tasks.title: Create detailed system architecture diagram
tasks.description: Design and create a comprehensive system architecture diagram for the threat modeling application

tasks.title: Design database schema for multi-methodology support
tasks.description: Design a flexible database schema that can support multiple threat modeling methodologies (STRIDE, LINDDUN, PASTA, etc.)

tasks.title: Plan RESTful API structure with GraphQL considerations
tasks.description: Design the API architecture supporting both REST and GraphQL endpoints

tasks.title: Design microservices architecture
tasks.description: Define microservices boundaries and communication patterns

tasks.title: Plan AI/ML integration architecture
tasks.description: Design the architecture for integrating AI/ML capabilities for threat detection and analysis

tasks.title: Design TMAC (Threat Modeling as Code) support
tasks.description: Design support for treating threat models as code with version control integration

tasks.title: Plan authentication and authorization system
tasks.description: Design comprehensive auth system supporting SSO, SAML, OIDC, and RBAC

tasks.title: Design integration points for Jira and CI/CD
tasks.description: Plan integration architecture for Jira issue tracking and CI/CD pipelines

tasks.title: Set up Docker development environment
tasks.description: Create Docker configuration for local development and deployment

tasks.title: Implement authentication service with SSO/SAML/OIDC
tasks.description: Build the authentication microservice based on the design from task 7
